com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.spec

Class BluetoothDeviceCharacteristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic
      • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.spec.BluetoothDeviceCharacteristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class BluetoothDeviceCharacteristic
extends android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic
    CharacteristicWrapper delegates methods to wrapped BluetoothGattCharacteristic (BluetoothGattCharacteristic). Please note that CharacteristicWrapper can create only characteristics identified by UUID ids described in kontakt.io iBeacon and Eddystone specification.
    See Also:
    kontakt.io Beacon Datasheet - version 2.0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable
